Topic.Title: Unable to edit Quest game at all (SOLVED)

Posts.EditableText:
Recently, I turned on DevMode option for my Quest game to make testing it easier, but when I wrote a DevMode initialization script for it, an internal error occurred, and whenever I try to edit my game now, it won’t load at all, no matter how long I wait. The tab is also now named “undefined.” I have searched for and found a few similar Quest forum posts like mine, but none of them had a satisfactory reply to them. If anyone can tell me what exactly happened (if DevMode is broken or anything), or if there is a way I could be able to edit my game again (I can’t use the offline editor because unfortunately I don’t own a working device that can run Quest online), I would appreciate if you could tell me. Or if I will permanently be unable to edit my game online, I’m willing to accept that, I just want to see if there is any way I can undo what happened to my game first.

EDIT: It’s okay I got it back by somehow getting my old Windows computer to work
Posts.HTML:
Recently, I turned on DevMode option for my Quest game to make testing it easier, but when I wrote a DevMode initialization script for it, an internal error occurred, and whenever I try to edit my game now, it won’t load at all, no matter how long I wait. The tab is also now named “undefined.” I have searched for and found a few similar Quest forum posts like mine, but none of them had a satisfactory reply to them. If anyone can tell me what exactly happened (if DevMode is broken or anything), or if there is a way I could be able to edit my game again (I can’t use the offline editor because unfortunately I don’t own a working device that can run Quest online), I would appreciate if you could tell me. Or if I will permanently be unable to edit my game online, I’m willing to accept that, I just want to see if there is any way I can undo what happened to my game first.

EDIT: It’s okay I got it back by somehow getting my old Windows computer to work

Posts.EditableText:
I think it would also help if I pasted here what happens if I try to play my game now— and reading it, I think the damage has already been done :,)

DevMode: Active

> #go 
Error running script: Error compiling expression 'command.parent = null or command.parent = game.pov.parent': Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
Error running script: Cannot foreach over '' as it is not a list
Error running script: Error evaluating expression 'GetFileData("DevMode/tabulator.css")': The remote server returned an error: (404) Not Found.

#go
Error running script: Error compiling expression 'command.parent = null or command.parent = game.pov.parent': Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
Error running script: Cannot foreach over '' as it is not a list
Error running script: Error evaluating expression 'GetFileData("DevMode/tabulator.css")': The remote server returned an error: (404) Not Found.
